mapper.select: select OB.orderNum, OB.recipient, OB.recipientAdrress, OB.recipientContact, OB.totalPrice, OB.orderDate, OBD.productListNum, OBD.amount, PB.productName, PB.productPrice, PB.productImgPath_0 from orderBoard as OB join orderBoardDetail as OBD on OB.orderNum = OBD.orderNum join productBoard as PB on OBD.productListNum = PB.productListNum where OB.userNum = #{userNum} and OB.orderNum = #{orderNum};
